entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -29.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
